definition[0]: to build something such as a house, bridge, road etc
example[0]: There are plans to construct a new road bridge across the river.

definition[1]: to form something such as a sentence, argument, or system by joining words, ideas etc together
example[2]: Boyce has constructed a new theory of management.

definition[3]: an idea formed by combining several pieces of information or knowledge
